Author: VodkaSodaSpirit
Text: thank you, that’s so kind of you to say. and i think you’re right, too—i know so many people who have some sort of issues going on, it seems kind of...delusional to think that you’ll find someone completely issue-less. but i also don’t blame him, he knew what he didn’t want in a relationship and that was apparently me. lol. in any case it’s been good because it finally pushed me into seeking therapy, which i should have done first instead of looking for a relationship.  i hope you’re doing well because you deserve absolutely wonderful things ❤️ thank you for these kind words this morning

Author: JennaGrizzlies
Text: I just want to say that you deserve better than him. The right person will want to help you with your problems, not run away because you have problems. So many people have mental health issues in modern society, you help the person you love through it. You deserve someone who's going to help you and be there with you as long as you're willing to try to change.
